alert.note: Alert for Cochise; Graham; Pima (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 30 at 5:44PM MST until August 30 at 6:30PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Pima County in southeastern Arizona... Southwestern Graham County in southeastern Arizona... Northwestern Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 630 PM MST. * At 544 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 20 miles northeast of Saguaro National Park East, or 26 miles north of Benson, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Muleshoe Ranch Preserve and Cascabel. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
